lines.text: Malcolm, get me my hypo-gun - quickly!
This could be the one chance in a lifetime. Who knows? An opportunity to lift the veil from the past.
Please, Trog, let me have the girl!

[to Trog, after having wrecked Dr. Brockton's laboratory]
You know what they'll say? They'll say that Trog has a very nasty temper. But what can you expect from a slimy beast? Go ahead, missing link -- if that's what you are you should be missing. You bloody monster!

We believe that Trog could be the connection between the creatures of early civilization and man as we know him today. This Troglodyte who somehow survived is a living reminder of what happened after our ancestors the apes left the forest, and first started to walk on hind legs, and take shelter in the caves.
Music hath charms that soothes the savage beast.
I don't know how long this tranquilizer will keep him harmless. We must get him back to my lab before the effects wear off.
